content: k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 all into the same stitch **row 1 ** slip1 k2tog k4 yo k1 + yo k4 s2kp k4 yo k1 +repeat to last 7 sts yo k4 ssk k1 363 sts **row 2 4 6 & 8 ** slip 1 purl to end of row **row 3 ** slip1 k2tog k3 yo k2 + k1 yo k3 s2kp k3 yo k2 +repeat to last 7 sts k1 yo k3 ssk k1 **row 5 ** slip1 k2tog k2 yo k2tog yo k1 + yo ssk yo k2 s2kp k2 yo k2tog yo k1 +repeat to last 7 sts yo ssk yo k2 ssk k1 **row 7 ** slip1 k2tog k1 yo k2tog yo k2 + k1 yo ssk yo k1 s2kp k1 yo k2tog yo k2 +repeat to last 7 sts k1 yo ssk yo k1 ssk k1 **row 9 ** slip1 k2tog yo k2tog yo k2 nupp + k2 yo ssk yo s2kp yo k2tog yo k2 nupp +repeat to last 7 sts k2 yo ssk yo ssk k1 **row 10 ** slip1 p6 + p7tog p11 +repeat to last 14 sts p7tog p7 **row 11 ** slip 1 k1 k2tog yo k2 nupp k1 + nupp k2 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k2 nupp k1 +repeat to last 7 sts nupp k2 yo ssk k2 **row 12 ** slip1 p5 p7tog + p1 p7tog p9 p7tog +repeat to last 14 sts p1 p7tog p6 **row 13 ** slip1 k2tog yo k2 nupp k2 + k1 nupp k2 yo s2kp yo k2 nupp k2 +repeat to last 7 sts k1 nupp k2 yo ssk k1 **row 14 ** slip1 p4 p7tog p1 + p2 p7tog p7 p7tog p1 +repeat to last 14 sts p2 p7tog p5 **row 15 ** slip1 k2tog k5 + k4 s2kp k5 +repeat to last 7 sts k4 ssk k1 303 sts **row 16 ** slip 1 purl to end of row **row 17 ** slip1 k2tog k4 + k3 s2kp k4 +repeat to last 6 sts k3 ssk k1 243 sts **row 18 ** slip 1 purl to end of row proceed to short row instructions may 29 2010 **the mistake in the lace chart is now corrected ** may 28 2010 **please note** - there is an error in row 13 of the lace chart it is missing two yarn overs the chart should read nupp k2 **yo** cdd **yo** k2 nupp instead of nupp k3 cdd k3 nupp
